text_blocks.content: FYI....My response will be: Good Morning
The guidance provided indicates this is an active and on-going investigation and as such the institution has not prepared a report for release on behalf of the BOP. You matter.

The contact information for the Office of General Counsel is: BOP-OGC/Assistant Director - @bop.gov 202-307-3062 Freedom of Information Act/Privacy Act Section Office of General Counsel, Room 936 Federal Bureau of Prisons 320 First Street, N.W. Washington, D.C. 20534 Email: OGC_EFOIA@BOP.GOV
Charisma Edge Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 646-836-6300 ext (b)(6); (b)(6); @bop.gov NYM/AW-Programs-@bop.gov

>>> James Petrucci (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) op> 11/5/2019 7:10 PM >>> No it is not. MCC has not prepared any reports and we will not release anything on behalf of the BOP. They can make requests to OIG, FBI and or Central Office, which I'm

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: Charisma Edge (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Date: 11/5/19 19:06 (GMT-05:00) To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Cc: James Petrucci (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Subject: Fwd: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054
>>> "Charisma Edge" 11/05/2019 19:06 >>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) is this a request we can fulfill?

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone -------- Original message -------- From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) JSMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> Date: 11/5/19 6:45 PM (GMT-05:00) To: Charisma Edge (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Subject: Epstein, Jeffrey 76318-054

>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) JSMS 11/05/2019 18:45 >>> Charisma Our Prisoner Operations Division in Headquarters is requesting any reports prepared in the investigation surrounding the death of EPSTEIN. They are requesting the inforr
Thank you (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Deputy United States Marshal Southern District of New York 646-942- (b)(6);

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing a request for information related to the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. The emails contain redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
